title: Barrier
description: "Don't tell me what you think you know, Evelyn. You don't know anything. Not any more." Evelyn didn't mean to escape from Boundary. Yet, somehow, she did. Now, thrust into an unfamiliar and dangerous world, the girl written off as a weak link must untangle the mystery of her past and find a way to rescue those still trapped within Boundary, all while battling her own doubts.But time is quickly running out. Evelyn has two choices: put her trust in an old enemy, or find herself completely alone...both are equally terrifying
author: Mary Victoria Johnson
